overview: José Soares is a simple employee of a tourism firm and lives in a pension, where the maid offers herself to him, but since he dreams of great girls, he despises her. With his friend João Manoel, uninhibited and handsome, he goes to Santos on the weekend looking for girls. But, it is not successful. Back at work, his friend insists on helping him, but his night out ends up in a fight, and he runs away, sleeping in the street, where he has erotic dreams. The maid, in a dream, starts disturbing him until she is seen in another way. He wakes up, shaken by her, having slept on the sidewalk.
title: Ou Dá... ou Desce
